@jr_pwn wrote:

ok what this code does now is you click on the coal rock. it starts the animation if you click it again after 15 seconds if give you the oreâ€¦ how can i keep it so you wait 15 seconds but it auto gives you the ore any advise?

case 2096: // coal rock case 2097: // coal rock if(IsMining == false && (actionTimer == 0 && (playerLevel[14] >= 30 && (HasItemAmount(1275, 1))))) // You need a pick axe and level 30 mining. { actionAmount++; sendMessage("You swing your pick axe at the rock..."); actionTimer = 15; if (actionTimer < 1) { actionTimer= 1; } setAnimation(0x554); // steel axe animation IsMining = true; } if(actionTimer == 0 && (IsMining == true)) { addItem(453, 1); addSkillXP((10*playerLevel[14]), 14); //gives 10 times your mining xp sendMessage("you get some ore"); resetAnimation(); } else if(playerLevel[14] < 30){ sendMessage("You do not have the level required to mine this ore"); IsMining = false; } else if(actionTimer > 0 && (actionTimer < 15)){ sendMessage("There is currently no ore in this rock"); IsMining = false; resetAnimation(); } else { sendMessage("You need a pickaxe to mine this rock."); } break;
